content: When scrolling through a stream with unread messages I'm having significant stutters.
Hm, looking at the profile it isn't super clear if its firefox's fault, some extension going rogue, or zulip's: https://share.firefox.dev/3fYb3XQ
Aha, looks to be an interaction between an addon, the fact that I have a huge number of tabs and the fact that zulip aggressively changes the document title when scrolling past unread messages.
